participant_1.background: i ride the bus to school. my brother is older than me. i'm 13 years old. i hate math class.

participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
